overview:
Brad Lindenberg is the founder and CEO of BuyReply, which he started in January 2012 with a small team. BuyReply was spawned out of Lindenberg’s venture incubator, Lind Ventures which was founded mid 2011.

Lindenberg is responsible for setting the overall direction and product strategy for BuyReply.

He leads the design of BuyReply’s service and development of its core technology and infrastructure.

Earlier in life, Lindenberg developed an eCommerce brand called Lind Golf (www.lindgolf.com) which was a pure play online golf equipment manufacturer that allowed golfers to customise their own golf equipment. He built Lind Golf from garage to acquisition in three years. Lind Golf was acquired by Australia’s largest online retailer. He did this having never played golf.

Lindenberg attended University of Technology Sydney and studied BIT (computer science) before founding Lind Golf. While at UTS, Lindenberg ran a computer support business which he built up to 200 small business clients. The business was sold to pursue Lind Golf.

Lindenberg was also the youngest Australian to receive certification from Microsoft as a Microsoft Certified Systems Engineer + Internet at the age of 16, in 1999.

He was awarded an Australian Anthill top 30 entrepreneur under 30 award 2 years running (2008, 2009).
